::Hot Rod::

He sees the bot that was helping CliffJumper attack the CF.
"What the?! I though you were here to help!"
He shot mini-rockets at that bot.(cant remember the name right now)

::DrillBit::

He drilled up at the battlefield.
"DrillBit, TERRORIZE!"
He transformed to bot mode, looking for a target. He wasn't sure who was
open, so he shot optic blasts at Unitron.

::Dollon::

He also arrives at the battle.
"Come on fools! Come and get me!"
He shoots wildly at the ex-Alliance troops.
